title: Inflation rate in Russia 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, containing a total of 31 data points.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 1995 and 1996.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 307.63 was reported at Year 1994
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 2.88 was reported at Year 2018

max_summary: The chart in general has a zig-zag shape.
The chart generally has many fluctuations.
The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 31.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
The chart in general has a zig-zag shape.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1995 and 1996.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 307.63 was reported at Year 1994
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 2.88 was reported at Year 2018

The line significantly decreased by 149.73 from Year 1995 to 1996,increased by 12.91 from Year 1997 to 1998,increased by 58.06 from Year 1998 to 1999,decreased by 64.96 from Year 1999 to 2000, and lastly, increased by 7.71 from Year 2014 to 2015.
